notes.text: This was my KOG deck. played it straight up from reset to KOG. tweeked it here and there with the techs but this is what I found to be more useful most of the time. bacon saver helped out a lot in mirror matches and opening with it and not being able to use it as ritual material is still ok. protects you for a couple of turns if you set, it dies and you can banish to negate an attack. that really important with a CA deck cause you wanna OTK most of the time. Saffira is great too. I found her very useful when I see my opponent struggling with resources, I get her out and have them discard. at the point, they would scoop. I ran no birds cause I personally found it cloggy on the field and eats up your normal summon when you could've used it for your senju or cyber petit.
